description: It's all about low and slow with this hearty lamb stew recipe. Opt for tougher cuts of meat, as they'll add extra flavour while getting softer as they cook.
name: Easy One-Pot Lamb Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return lamb to pan with potato and reduce heat to simmer. Cover and cook for 1-1 1/4 hours or until lamb and potato are tender. Stir in parsley. Top with herbs.
